Content.title: Web Designer
Content.name: Web Designer
Content.bodyText: That's a basic fail. They obviously don't know what they are doing and simply try to explain their mistake instead of fixing this bug. Probably, it's nothing difficult to fix this validation or simply to turn off the auto correction. I have seen many web based apps in the corporate or gov offices. It's a fact they could do much better and there is plenty to improve. I would love to be able to work on the gov projects...
